docs.snippet: Do most of your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat and other social media friends seem to have the same basic beliefs about politics, religion and other ideological topics as you do? How can you tell? Have people posted things that challenge o...
docs.abstract: Do most of your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat and other social media friends seem to have the same basic beliefs about politics, religion and other ideological topics as you do? How can you tell? Have people posted things that challenge or conflict with your beliefs or offend you in some way? If so, what did you do?

headline.main: Do Your Friends on Social Media All Have the Same Political Opinions You Do?
